function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of COVID-19 from animal to human","Impact":"Increased risk of human infection and spread of disease","Mitigation":"Improved animal health monitoring and surveillance, vaccination of at-risk animal populations","Technologies":"Genomic sequencing to track virus transmission from animals to humans","People":"Animal handlers, farmers, and those in close contact with wildlife","Owner":"Government agencies, veterinary organizations, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Contaminated wastewater flow to the wastewater treatment plant","Impact":"Spread of COVID-19 through the water treatment process","Mitigation":"Improvement of wastewater treatment processes, monitoring of influent for viral traces","Technologies":"Advanced water treatment systems, real-time monitoring for viral RNA","People":"Wastewater treatment plant operators, public health officials","Owner":"Local government, utility companies, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Direct consumption of contaminated water by rural and urban communities","Impact":"Increase in COVID-19 cases due to waterborne transmission","Mitigation":"Implementation of point-of-use water treatment, public health education on water safety","Technologies":"Water filtration and disinfection systems for households and communities","People":"Rural and urban residents, especially those with limited access to clean water","Owner":"NGOs, community organizations, public health agencies"}]}
